phrases: We kissed, held hands,
and walked to the convenience store without saying a word.
Blinking eyes call the wind
A smile clears all the noise away
The angel in your eyes whispers
Everything begins now
Can you feel it now Can you feel it now
It is like being caught in a wave
Pulling on my heart Pulling on my heart
Breath held, arms reaching out
Baby this world is different from yesterday's
You are the only one I can see
Baby my wish on a wing
This sky is torn
By a single overflowing word
His hand is so warm.
Just like Nana's.
I do not ever want to let go of this hand.
What do I need to do to have him understand this feeling?
I am the girl who could not send Takumi back that time
when Nobu was with me.
No matter what I say, I feel like he is not going to believe me at this point.
But the truth is, I have been holding back the whole time.
I wanted to become Nobu's girlfriend.
I wanted to touch him.
I had secretly been wishing
for the day when he would hold me in his arms
as we would walk this path along the river.
What expression do you have right now,
and what are you thinking?
I am too scared to find out.
It is okay if you want to take me away somewhere.
But what if he then thinks I could easily fall for a guy
even though I have a boyfriend, and ends up seriously hating me?
What is with all this boring talk, baldy?
We just have to sell records, right?
That is no big deal at all.
Hurry up and tell Kawano to have the contract ready.
Got it?
Answer me.
Okay.
Man, this is really making me sleepy.
I am so sleepy, I could go bald.
I am taking a bath and going to bed.
Huh?
Are not you going to stay up until Hachiko returns?
She will not be coming back.
I win the bet.
I bet one hundred yen that he will come before they even do it!
But Miss Hachiko has a boyfriend.
Well, if I cannot stay at Nobu's place,
I guess I will just go back to my parent's place tonight.
Your parent's place?
Oh, hello, Ryoko?
Working hard?
I am sorry for not contacting you until now.
Yeah, I am fine.
I am coming over now, okay?
Well, see ya, Misato.
Huh?!
You are leaving?!
What about the wine?
Wait, Shin!
Who is Ryoko?
She raised me.
Liar.
I know you do not have a mother.
How do you know that?
If you do not want people finding out about you,
at least be smart enough to use an alias.
Lately, I have not told anyone my full name.
Not that I care if people find out,
but I do not like people snooping around.
Then do not do things to make people worry.
You can put up a front as you like, but you are still a fifteen-year-old kid.
You will need a guardian to sign on your behalf
on the record contract.
If you do not want to see him, I will go and get that signature for you.
I am counting on you, Yasu.
Misato, I am going home, too.
Huh?
Sorry, I have got a lot of work to do.
That is fine.
I do not mind, but...
Does that mean you have accepted defeat in that bet you made?
Hachiko already has a boyfriend, so are you all right with that?
Or rather, is Nobu all right with that?
I do not know.
Well, a man becomes weak toward the woman he loves,
but I just cannot understand what goes on in the complicated mind of a woman.
In other words, it is a complicated situation, is not it?
I am sorry.
I will try to be more discreet.
You will be here until the end of summer vacation, right, Misato?
Are your parents okay with that?
Yes.
There is no need to worry.
Can I ask you a personal question?
What is it?
Misato Uehara.
What is your real name?
It is a secret.
It really was a fake name.
And she is such a nice girl.
I really cannot understand women.
Man, oh man...
Huh?
Oh, there she is.
2001 FIREWORKS DISPLAY WEDNESDAY, AUGUST 22ND TAMAGAWA RIVERBED 19:00 to 20:45
They are having fireworks!
It is close by.
Want To go together?
I will carry one.
It is okay.
Actually, carry one.
How can you tell?
Huh?
Tell what?
What I am thinking.
I cannot tell.
I kind of feel a connection.
Really?
I am feeling awkward not having a clue what you are getting at,
so if possible, I would like you to explain it to me.
Telepathy?
Listen to what I am saying.
Sorry, I have a tendency to get carried away.
No, it is ok.
Actually I find that dreamy side of you quite attractive.
Is he disappointed?
What should I do?
Say, that method you use where you seem interested,
and then you pull back.
Is that a trap to get a man to fall for you?
No!
You seem carefree, but you are really cunning.
You are wrong!
What a terrible woman.
Did the Demon Lord send you?
That is why you talk passionately about him like some missionary!
That is not true!
You said so yourself, that you are a horrible woman...
I was joking, do not cry!
I am sorry.
I will break it off with Takumi.
I really did not want anyone to know about what happened with Takumi.
I thought, then I could act like nothing happened and
become your girlfriend.
I had such cunning thoughts.
Lots of them.
Are you disappointed?
No.
I am happy.
Stop staring at me with those teary eyes.
I will not be able to hold back.
I cannot take you from him by force.
I cannot have you do something that will make you a horrible woman.
If we let things get outta control now,
you will end up being trapped between Takumi and me,
and you will suffer.
Because you are kind and fragile.
I do not find you cunning.
Do not be so hard on yourself.
It cannot be helped that you are attracted to Takumi.
No matter how hard I try,
I will probably never be able to compete with him.
That is not true!
I!
But if you tell me that
you are still going to break it off with him and be my woman...
I will do everything I can to make you happy.
For the sake of your happiness, I will do everything within my power.
Am I dreaming?
I mean, with you by my side, I feel like I can do anything.
But it is a dream that I will not wake up from.
When you break up with Takumi...
and sort out your feelings... then come to me.
I will be waiting faithfully.
Hey, Nana, I have fallen in love many times to this day,
but I never imagined that a man existed in real life
that would say those things and mean it.
What words has Ren given you so far?
I want to talk to you, Nana.
Sorry for getting back so late.
It is okay.
Actually, you are early.
Are you alone?
Huh?
Where are Shin and Yasu?
Oh, they went home already.
What the heck?!
And I bought all this for them!
I am sorry.
Let us save that for the next party.
By the way, where is Nobu?
He walked me here,
but he said he was going home because he has to work tomorrow.
Is that so?
So, something did happen?
Then I guess we can call it a day.
I am working from the morning tomorrow, too.
Do you mind if I take a bath first?
Oh!
Nana's in there right now.
I figured you would barge in here.
You have got to do something about that hobby of yours to peep.
Nana.
Do not get in!
What the hell are you thinking?!
What is the big deal?
We are both girls.
I am not into taking baths with other women!
So you would with a man?
That is normal.
It is usually the other way around.
Besides, it would be one thing to share a bath with a human girl,
but this is a female dog that just got back from a walk.
Wait, Nana.
Listen.
It is about Nobu.
What about Nobuo?
He asked me to go see the fireworks with him.
Then go.
Is he still in elementary school?!
He is useless!
That man's got no balls!
In any case, Yasu won the bet.
No wonder he is the leader.
He knows everything about his band members.
I think I will wait until after I break up with Takumi before I tell Nana.
She arranged for me to meet with Takumi,
and cheered me on hoping the relationship would succeed.
I am sure she will be like, What the hell?!
If I were in Nana's shoes, that is what I would think.
Not only Nana.
Everyone would think that.
I will say goodbye to him over the phone.
I do not want to see his face when he gets hurt.
He is so full of pride.
Over the past few days,
these mosquitoes have taken a liking to my place.
They are so annoying.
Huh?!
Your place too, Takumi?
Darn.
I was all excited because it was like I was the only celebrity.
Nothing to be excited about!
Mosquitoes?
It is summer, after all.
For real, Reira?
They are at my place, too.
The paparazzi.
I wonder whose blood they want to suck.
Then they must be at my place, too.
This is bad.
It is your blood they want.
Oh, that is right.
You have got a woman staying at your place, do not you Ren?
Make her go home before they find out.
We cannot afford any scandals with you in it.
What is wrong with that?
Ren Honjo's passionate love life uncovered!
It is not going to hurt you, right?
In fact, it is adorable.
I will tell her to dress properly whenever she goes out.
By the way, when can we return to our homes
where the mosquitoes wait for us?
Then go home.
Our band will be just fine without you, Naoki.
THERE IS SOMETHING I WANT TO TALK TO YOU ABOUT.
COULD YOU CALL ME WHEN YOU HAVE A MOMENT?
SORRY TO BOTHER YOU AT A BUSY TIME.
NANA
You did not have to respond so quickly.
Hello?
What did you want to talk to me about?
What is the matter?
Did something happen?
The phone will not do.
I cannot say goodbye over the phone.
It is inhumane.
Can we meet now and talk?
Sorry.
We are filming a TV show right now.
Oh, is that so?
Sorry to bug you during work.
It is okay.
We spend more time waiting than shooting.
It is such a drag.
That is rare for you to be on TV.
Satellite TV.
They are doing a special on us.
Really?
But we do not have a tuner at home.
If you are a fan, then buy one.
This is not good.
This is no time to be chatting casually.
What is the matter?
Is it something you cannot discuss over the phone?
I am fully booked for a while, and I cannot make any plans.
I see...
What?
Do not tell me you are pregnant!
Huh?!
No, that is not it!
So that is not it.
Thank goodness.
You scared me there.
I may not look it, but I am pretty sensitive.
I do not deal well with inconveniences like that.
Sorry.
Inconvenience?
Who talks like that?!
Tossing aside his responsibilities like it is the normal thing to do!
There is something wrong with him as a human being!
And why am I apologizing?!
We are up.
Sorry, I will have to go now.
I will call you when I have some time.
You do not have to!
In fact, do not ever call me again!
Goodbye!
I told him.
I was able to tell him!
It is over.
Nana seems pissed off with me.
Huh?
Nana?
Oh, you mean Hachiko.
I can see why she is pissed off.
Do not tell me you are pregnant!
You scared me there.
An inconvenience.
And you say you are sensitive?
You do not even have an ounce of sensitivity.
But it would really be a problem, so I had to tell her.
Besides, she would be the one most troubled by it.
If you think so, then I suggest you come up with a proper and bright family plan.
You are one to talk.
It is not a problem with me.
In fact, I would love to start a bright family.
But she is on the pill again.
Such a dark woman.
So it is all about what you want.
He is not calling back.
How come?
That is so anti-climactic.
Why was I clinging onto such a loveless man?
It is like a love that lasted one hundred years
coming to an abrupt end.
Wait a minute.
I knew from the start that Takumi had no love in him.
There is no way Takumi would be hurt by what I say.
I have awakened from a hundred-year sleep.
That is all.
Every time we meet,
we get under the covers and he tells me sweet nothings.
Whenever we held each other tight,
I vaguely had this vision that a day will come when this will turn to love.
Still that was nothing but an illusion.
I have finally awakened to the truth.
I will be waiting faithfully.
The kiss of a real prince has awakened me.
PRINCE
Although he does not really strike me as the prince type.
But never mind that.
You surprised me!
Sorry to bother you at work.
Nana told me where you work.
So you work in a record store.
Come to think of it,
you have got a lot of records at your place, too.
Actually, I only work here twice a week.
Other days, I have short term jobs, and other stuff.
I see.
By the way, what time do you get off today?
At nine.
Then I will wait for you until then at the cafe next door.
Come to think of it,
there are many things that I do not know about Nobu yet.
I want to learn everything about him.
But I will bet his blood type is A.
Since he is basically a serious person.
Darn it.
I am feeling restless.
Hi there!
Stop startling me!
Hey Nobu, are you hungry?
I came directly after work, so I have not eaten anything either.
Oh?
Then let us have dinner somewhere.
Actually, I want to go to your place and make something!
Huh?
My place?
- No good! - Why not?
I told you yesterday.
Put an end to things first, and then come to me.
But I did.
That is why I came.
Too fast!
I am sorry.
But I was holding back all day today.
The day seemed like a year to me.
It might have felt like a year to you, but one day is still one day.
Then I will try and wait for one more day.
Do you know how to make nikujaga?
It is my specialty!
She is so cute!
Let us just pretend that a year has passed.
Where is Hachiko?
She said she may not be coming home today.
I got an email from her.
You think she is at her boyfriend's place again?
What?
But I thought they are filming until midnight.
TELL ME WHERE NOBU WORKS!
HACHIKO
Hey, Nana...
What words of love has Ren given you?
I should have asked you then.
I should have found out.
That claw-foot bathtub is not here anymore.
I reached into the sky
But I could not reach what I wanted
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
Like colorful balloons
I am alone
My hand had no place to go
And gently you took it
Starless night
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
I want to feel your warmth
Tears are falling down
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
Of your hand holding mine
